comments.comment:
Me harakek wage hesirenna epa wenna deyak ne wela iwaray
Oya wagema kiyapanko balanna ranil sathay miytreey ara ganika madam kaara dhammika pereray thope aandu gahapu rata paawa dena hora givisum genay thope kata nedda ewata
Anika oba thuma danaganna oya vidiyata sambuddha saasanaya minisun athare piri hewwahama budurajanan wahanseta sangarathnayata paaduy kiyalada
Minissu daanna maanadiyen pinen welakunoth thotay matay minis sathwayantay paadu dana ganin eka uba kata bada ruwa oya okkoma thinne budu waru desu maga gihin sill guna daana manna deepu nisay
Nethnam uba nirayey me wanvitath
Uba ada yepenna waachalayek wage sambuddha rathnaye adu paadu kiyala samajaye minisun athare weradi awabodha athi kota sathwayage sith thula viraya athi karana deyin minisun sangaya wahanselagen ath wey ethakota danaganin uba wage moda me panchaskanda sansaaraye paw pin adura gan thiwa pinen kusalayen seelayen welakila his athin merila sathara apayey upadinne
Ubawage ekek nam sathara apaya kiyana wachanayawath ahala nethiwa athi oni nam ahapan ubage mahaloku mamage kaaloda mokada inne
Uba oya vidiyata ekin eka daapanko maha banku mankollaya/ singappu givsum/ara sabeethalata koti 200ganan rental eka sereta deepu hora ranila gena ehemath
Pawkaara satha  thota hambawey chanda balan idapan me sere

replies.replyComment: kelani agencies    ganaya kiyanne godak hoda wachanayak malli. Hamuduruwo desapalanaya karana wata mama kamathi na. Api  siurata garu kala yuthui. Eth me ranja kiyannema boru. Ranja wage kisi wadakata nathi minihekuta mama kamathi na. Kata kiyanawa wage wada karanne nathte ai. Dan rajapaksala ta banala wadak na.

kelani agencies dan ranjage keruwawa eli wela neda malli. Uge naya gewa ganna ahinsaka ganungen higa kala salli aragena dan nadu neda. Thawath boho de oba dannawa neda. ada hetama ranja hire yanawa. E nisa aththa peni penee wasan karanna epa. Apita kagen wath wadak na. Pau duppath minissu.
Indrani Dombawala Ubela Wage Gon Huththiyanewe Mahinda Pawichchi Keranne Naha Ban.Miniha Pawichchi Keranne Sangeetha Wage Badu.Ubela Wage Mahindate Nayete Kahine Gon Nambiyo NemeüòÉüòÉüòÉ

nishantha lakpriya  athtama thamai ranja ponnayek ne. Oka karana dewal uba dannawane. Oya wage pankadayo lagata niliyo yana wada. Ane pau mage thattha rjek wage. Inne canadawe. Oya seppadayo thamuseta balu nattek unata mata nam penne mail haluna ballek wage. Thamuse ranja wasikili giyama puka lewa kanawa athi. Ekane ochchara tharaha yanne. Ada pththre wisthare boru wela neda. Mahinda rajek apita.

Indrani Dombawala  Rajan Kollo Gahanne Naha Huththiye! Thoge Puruddene Tho Kiyanne Tho Gon Huththiye! Thoge Amma Tho Eheme Denewa Athi. Habai Tho Thoge Ammawe Ranjante Dunnath Ai munusseyate Thoge Ammawe Wadak Naha U Hukanne Lassene Niliyante Ban.Ubela Wage Ponne Huththiyante Neme. Ube Nikam illan Kanewa Gon HuththiyeüòÉüòÉüòÉ

nishantha lakpriya aaa pakayo tho ranja ponnayage puke ariyada. Ponnaya tho sariyak adapiya. Ape agamata agaurawaya nokara. Hukan nathuwa oppu karapiya oka. Nathnam thoge amma gihin deepiya ranjata puke arinna. Wesa balla.
Indrani Dombawala Walle Gunawansha Pabatath Hikuwa! Aththe Kiyenekote Ochchere Ubetath Amaru Ubetath Hikuwade? Gon NambiyeüêÇ

nishantha lakpriya thamuse ranjage boru ahala hamuduru wanta baninna epa. Oba ranjath ekka ekathu wela naduwak dala usawiyen waradi karaya unoth baninna. Minissu me tharam pahath widihata hithanne ai. Thamath mahinda waradi karaya karanna bari una neda. Thamuse dan heluwen pare palayan. Pau karaya.
Walle Gunawanse... Oka Oye Salli Welin Badu Gahanne AthiüòÉüòÉüòÉ

Un thamai rata kanne. Thama pansala oluwe thiyagenada inne? Penne nadda sangayo karana weda. Agama adahanna pansala, sangayo one Naha.
New York Times ekata avurudu thunak giyath dahayak giyath, aththa aththa. Paththareta kiyawanne nathuwa, horunta padam ugannana. Deshapalana Pathi ganna EPA mokada Hama ekama horu.
